Alias.name: setDoor
setExit
Alias.script:
local convertExit = { ["n"] = "north", ["ne"] = "northeast", ["e"] = "east", ["se"] = "southeast", ["s"] = "south", ["sw"] = "southwest", ["w"] = "west", ["nw"] = "northwest", ["i"] = "in", ["o"] = "out", ["u"] = "up", ["d"] = "down" } local exitmap = { ["north"] = true, ["northeast"] = true, ["east"] = true, ["southeast"] = true, ["south"] = true, ["southwest"] = true, ["west"] = true, ["northwest"] = true, ["in"] = true, ["out"] = true, ["up"] = true, ["down"] = true } --the only valid direction names we accept --the setExit function also takes short direction names or exit numbers --but since the roomExits table only returns long direction names --we need to convert the short names to long ones anyway
local roomID = getPlayerRoom() local roomExits = getRoomExits(roomID) local dir = matches[2]
if convertExit[dir] ~= nil then --input is in the conversion table dir = convertExit[matches[2]] --go and convert it end
if exitmap[dir] then --we've got a valid direction input if roomExits[dir] == tonumber(matches[3]) then --there is an exit to that room in that direction already setExit(roomID, -1, dir) --remove the exit echo(dir.." exit to "..matches[3].." removed
") elseif roomExits[dir] ~= nil then --there's an exit in that direction, donno where it goes setExit(roomID, -1, dir) --remove the exit setExit(roomID, matches[3], dir) --replace it with the requested exit echo(dir.." exit to "..matches[3].." replaced
") else setExit(roomID, matches[3], dir) --add the requested exit echo(dir.." exit to "..matches[3].." added
") end else echo("please enter a valid direction
") end

Alias.name: shiftRoom
Alias.script:
--logic appropriated from Generic Mapper
local coordMap = { ["north"] = {0,1,0}, ["northeast"] = {1,1,0}, ["east"] = {1,0,0}, ["southeast"] = {1,-1,0}, ["south"] = {0,-1,0}, ["southwest"] = {-1,-1,0}, ["west"] = {-1,0,0}, ["northwest"] = {-1,1,0}, ["n"] = {0,1,0}, ["ne"] = {1,1,0}, ["e"] = {1,0,0}, ["se"] = {1,-1,0}, ["s"] = {0,-1,0}, ["sw"] = {-1,-1,0}, ["w"] = {-1,0,0}, ["nw"] = {-1,1,0} } --allows us to convert directional input into useful coordinates
if coordMap[matches[2]] ~= nil then --we have valid directional input local x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(getPlayerRoom()) local coords = coordMap[matches[2]] x = x + coords[1] y = y + coords[2] z = z + coords[3] setRoomCoordinates(getPlayerRoom(),x,y,z) centerview(getPlayerRoom()) echo("room shifted\n") else echo("please use a compass direction\n") end

Alias.name: moveRoom
resetRoom
Alias.script: local roomID = getPlayerRoom() setRoomName(roomID, gmcp.room.info.name) --native mapper function to set the name fedmap.roomColor(roomID) --resets color & symbols local coordX, coordY = fedmap.makeCoords(gmcp.room.info.num) --get room's default location setRoomCoordinates(roomID, coordX, coordY, 0) --move room to default position centerview(roomID) --centers the map in case the room moved echo("room reset to defaults\n")

Alias.name: resetExits
Alias.script:
local roomID = getPlayerRoom() local areaID = getRoomArea(roomID) local exitMap = getRoomExits(roomID)
for dir, num in pairs(exitMap) do --remove all existing exits setExit(roomID, -1, dir) end fedmap.generateExits(areaID, roomID) --set exits from scratch echo("exits reset\n")

Alias.script: echo("fedmap is designed to 'just work' and will run autonomously ") echo("there are some special commands to tweak rooms once they're mapped ") echo("all input should be always lowercase ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap symbol {text}': will add text to the room you're in ") echo("recommended 1 or 2 characters only, will accept ascii/unicode/emoji ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap clear symbol': will clear any existing text in your room ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap color {color}': sets the room's color ") echo("available colors: ") echo("red, green, yellow, blue, magenta, cyan, ") echo("white, black, grey, bright grey, ") echo("bright red, bright green, bright yellow, ") echo("bright blue, bright magenta, bright cyan. ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap door {direction} {door color}': sets some cosmetic lines on the map ") echo("available door colors: ") echo("'none', 'green', 'yellow', or 'red' ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap exit {direction} {room number}': manually sets a one-way exit ") echo("running it on an exit that already exists will remove it instead ") echo("good for situations where exits appear and disappear, such as earth's shuttle ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap shift {direction}': nudges a room one square in the indicated direction ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap move {x coordinate} {y coordinate}': moves the room to the specified coordinates ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap reset room': resets the room to its default name, color, symbols, and coordinates ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap reset exits': resets the room's exits to whatever the game is showing right now ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap reset zoom': resets the area's zoom to the default ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap delete area': wipes the current map, for when you want to start over completely ") echo(" ") cecho("'fedmap grid {on/off}': toggles mapper's grid mode, smushing rooms together and hiding exit lines ")
